r.s: Create and Use PHP Archive files
r.d: PHP_Archive allows you to create a single .phar file containing an entire application.
r.n: * Full support for multiple .phars! phar://pharname.phar/file and phar://phar2.phar/anotherfile will work now * Fix gz compression * remove Archive_Tar dep for non-creation * remove preg dep for non-creation * bundle PHP_Archive in all created .phars - standalone! Only compressed .phars have a dep on zlib * Add support for filenames > 100 characters in length and unit test * Add full support for stat()/is_file()/is_dir()/is_readable() etc., opendir()/readdir()
